unittitle_ssm: Daniel I. Underhill Civil War correspondence typescripts
abstract_ssm: A collection of typewritten copies of letters written by Daniel I. Underhill, a Civil War soldier, to his family on Long Island. The letters are dated 1862 to 1863. Original copies of the letters were owned by R.J. Cooke of Oceanside, NY, who gifted these copies.
collection_ssm: Daniel I. Underhill Civil War correspondence typescripts
heading_ssm: Daniel I. Underhill Civil War correspondence typescripts

collection_sim: Daniel I. Underhill Civil War correspondence typescripts
